players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Bob, please vote Charlie with me."

Charlie: "Bob, Alice is lying—there’s only one mafioso and she’s claiming a result that conveniently can’t be verified. If she were real, why out instantly? Let’s no-lynch today and hear everyone first."

Bob: "Claims this early are risky, but with 1 mafia, a detective outing Day 1 makes sense to avoid a mislynch. Charlie, why advocate no-lynch when that gives mafia a free kill? I’m leaning to vote Charlie unless you counter."
You: "Bob, there’s 1 mafia and I got Charlie as guilty. If we no-lynch, mafia kills and we lose tomorrow. No counter-claim means my detective claim stands. Please vote Charlie now."
Bob: "Alice’s claim makes sense: with 1 mafia, outing Day 1 avoids a mislynch. Charlie, last chance—do you counter-claim Detective? If not, I’m voting you."
Charlie: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Bob, please vote Charlie with me."
You: "Bob, Alice is lying—there’s only one mafioso and she’s claiming a result that conveniently can’t be verified. If she were real, why out instantly? Let’s no-lynch today and hear everyone first."

Bob: "Claims this early are risky, but with 1 mafia, a detective outing Day 1 makes sense to avoid a mislynch. Charlie, why advocate no-lynch when that gives mafia a free kill? I’m leaning to vote Charlie unless you counter."
Alice: "Bob, there’s 1 mafia and I got Charlie as guilty. If we no-lynch, mafia kills and we lose tomorrow. No counter-claim means my detective claim stands. Please vote Charlie now."
Bob: "Alice’s claim makes sense: with 1 mafia, outing Day 1 avoids a mislynch. Charlie, last chance—do you counter-claim Detective? If not, I’m voting you."
You: remained silent.
